title: Xbox Series X Unboxing & Review!
description: The Microsoft Xbox Series X brings serious competition to the PS5 but is it enough? Why you need a new TV for Xbox Series X and PS5:  Does the Xbox Series X overheat?   My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  Our second channel @thisis!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
